mapper.select: select a.id,a.plate_id,a.title,a.summary,a.author_id,a.context,a.weight,a.view_count,u.nickname nickname, (select count(id) from bbs_like where is_disable=0 and a.id=article_id group by article_id) likeCount, (select count(id) from bbs_review where is_disable=0 and a.id=article_id group by article_id) comments, (select type from bbs_annal where is_disable=0 and type=1 and a.id=article_id and 1 = user_id group by article_id) collect from bbs_article a left join sys_user u on u.id=a.author_id where a.is_disable = 0 order by weight,view_count,a.gmt_create,a.gmt_modified
